0.label: Tram, Streetcar, Light rail
0.description: Any light rail or street level system within a metropolitan area.

1.label: Subway, Metro
1.description: Any underground rail system within a metropolitan area.

2.label: Rail
2.description: Used for intercity or long-distance travel.

3.label: Bus
3.description: Used for short- and long-distance bus routes.

4.label: Boat, Ferry
4.description: Used for short- and long-distance boat service.

5.label: Cable tram
5.description: Used for street-level rail cars where the cable runs beneath the vehicle (e.g., cable car in San Francisco).

6.label: Aerial lift, suspended cable car (e.g., gondola lift, aerial tramway)
6.description: Cable transport where cabins, cars, gondolas or open chairs are suspended by means of one or more cables.

7.label: Funicular
7.description: Any rail system designed for steep inclines.

11.label: Trolleybus
11.description: Electric buses that draw power from overhead wires using poles.

12.label: Monorail}
12.description: Railway in which the track consists of a single rail or a beam.

idle.title: Adicione um ficheiro shapes.txt para importar em lote
idle.description: Este processo irá criar novas shapes. Será necessário posteriormente associar estas shapes aos patterns.

accept.title: Largue para iniciar a importação
accept.description: Este processo irá criar novas shapes. Será necessário posteriormente associar estas shapes aos patterns.

reject.title: Adicione apenas ficheiros TXT ou CSV
reject.description: Não é possível aceitar esta seleção.

parsing_error.title: Ocorreu um erro na importação
parsing_error.description: Não foi possível importar o(s) ficheiro(s). Por favor verifique a formatação.

ImportPatternFromGTFS.title: These are the Trips found in the uploaded GTFS:

import.title: Import Path
import.description: This will immediately replace all stops for this pattern. This cannot be undone.

idle.title: Drag here the GTFS archive exported from Remix, or click to select from a folder.
idle.description: Please choose only one archive that is no bigger than {max_file_size_value} {max_file_size_unit}.

reject.title: The selected file cannot be accepted.
reject.description: Are you sure you have the .zip file exported from Remix?

sequence_index.label: Stop sequence
sequence_index.description: The sequence of stops in the path.

allow_pickup.label: Allow Pickup
allow_pickup.description: Passengers can ENTER the vehicle at this stop.

allow_drop_off.label: Allow Drop Off
allow_drop_off.description: Passengers can EXIT the vehicle at this stop.

distance_delta.label: Distance between stops
distance_delta.description: Distance between previous and current stop.

default_velocity.label: Average Speed
default_velocity.description: Average speed on the segment between previous and current stop.

default_travel_time.label: Average Travel Time
default_travel_time.description: Average travel time calculated based on distance and average speed on the segment between previous and current stop.

default_dwell_time.label: Average Dwell Time
default_dwell_time.description: Average time stopped at the current stop picking up and dropping off passengers.

remove.label: Remove Stop
remove.description: Remove this stop from the path sequence.

velocity.label: Average Speed
velocity.description: Average speed on the segment between previous and current stop.
velocity.apply: Apply this Velocity to All Stops

modal.title: Replace Velocities
modal.description: Are you sure you want to replace the currently set Velocities with this preset value?
modal.confirm: Yes, set this value for all stops

notification.success: Velocity for all stops updated to {value}

dwell_time.label: Average Dwell Time
dwell_time.description: Average time stopped at the current stop picking up and dropping off passengers.
dwell_time.apply: Apply this Dwell Time to All Stops

modal.title: Replace Dwell Times
modal.description: Are you sure you want to replace the currently set Dwell Times with this preset value?
modal.confirm: Yes, set this value for all stops

notification.success: Dwell Time for all stops updated to {value}

start_time.label: Start Time
start_time.description: The start time for this trip.

header.title: Calendars ON
header.description: Set of dates on which this schedule is running.

header.title: Calendars OFF
header.description: Set of dates to subtract from Calendars ON.

header.title: Calendar Description
header.description: Calendars where this trip does not have service.

calendar_desc.label: Calendar Description
calendar_desc.placeholder: Only on the first Sunday of the month
calendar_desc.description: This field should be filled if this trip has a special calendar.

modal.title: Are you sure you want to remove this schedule?

gtfs_v18.label: GTFS Reference Plan (v18)
gtfs_v18.description: For A1 and A2 until December 2023.

gtfs_v18.label: GTFS v18
gtfs_v18.description: For A1 and A2 until December 2023.

ExportedFilesList.title: Available Exports
ExportedFilesList.description: Here you can find all the previous exports by all users.

ExportFileForm.title: Start New Export
ExportFileForm.description: To create a new export you need to select the type, date, etc.

export_type.label: What do you want to export?
export_type.description: Choose the type of archive you need.

agencies.label: Choose an Agency
agencies.description: Select the Agency that you'd like to get the GTFS for.

lines_include.label: Export for specific Lines
lines_include.description: Choose Lines to create an archive with only this selection, or leave empty for all.

lines_exclude.label: Exclude specific Lines
lines_exclude.description: Choose Lines to exlude from the archive or leave empty for all.

feed_start_date.label: Feed Start Date
feed_start_date.description: The feed is valid starting from this date.

feed_end_date.label: Feed End Date
feed_end_date.description: The feed is valid until this date.

adjust_calendars.label: Adjust Calendars
adjust_calendars.description: If this option is enabled, the exported feed will only contain calendars with dates between the start and end dates selected below (inclusive).

calendars_start_date.label: Calendars Start Date
calendars_start_date.description: The feed starts on this date.

calendars_end_date.label: Calendars End Date
calendars_end_date.description: The feed ends on this date.

stop_sequence_start.label: Stop Sequence start value
stop_sequence_start.description: The order of stops in stop_times.txt should start with 1, but it is possible to start on 0.

CalendarPatternsView.title: Patterns that have at least one schedule with this calendar:
CalendarPatternsView.label: View Patterns using this calendar
